name: Autoviva
tag_list: car, cars, social-network, car-social-network, car-portal, car-news, car-profiles, car-database, car-model-database, car-encyclopedia
overview:
Autoviva.com is a community and social network for everything cars. Targeting both the enthusiast and the general consumer looking for information, it provides a social and content destination with the largest car database on the web.

Autoviva takes a new approach to the social community interface with the visual feed, a simplified way of interacting with what’s important in the news feed at a glance. An elastic layout allows the content to be optimized for any screen size, changing the traditional user experience for browsing large portals.

Original and comprehensive car database (largest currently on the web) covering car related themes. Tightly integrated with related content like articles, profiles and classifieds.

Other services and features include:

Social marketplace: Ads and special requests can be shared on friend pools and other networks (facebook, twitter), reaching wider circles with peer approval.

Local shop: E-currency (vivas) to exchange for discounts on virtual goods and real world services from a selection of partners.

Green area: The most economical, practical, and green cars: news, tips and technologies.

Gears: Expanding base of fun and useful applications such as dream garage, comparison tool and fuel consumption log
